website_summaries.verdict: Adidas Terrex AX3 GTX (men’s and women’s)  proves its worthiness on the trail through its performance. It is regarded as an excellent overall gear. Not to mention, it also received praises for its grippy sole, effective waterproofing, and lightness. However, its reported drawbacks may drive potential buyers away. In conclusion, the Terrex AX3 GTX can still be hiking companion in a not-so-demanding terrain— where one does not require much stability and support.
pros: A majority of owners who have worn the Adidas Terrex AX3 GTX hiking shoe mentions how comfortable it is to wear
It is considered a great overall shoe by a good number of wearers
This comfy trail shoe is liked by many reviewers for not weighing a ton
Its traction on wet surfaces pleases some online buyers
Plenty of verified purchasers who have tested the shoe in boggy areas state that its waterproof liner is effective
The Terrex AX3 GTX surprises a few users with its breathability
cons: A small percentage of wearers say that this Adidas product lacks stability
A couple of outdoor lovers comment that they do not like its stock insole
They added that it offers no support at all
The Terrex AX3 GTX from Adidas is a bit stiff out of the box, according to some owners
They also mention that they are not happy with its break-in period

customer_reviews.title: Inside seams dig in, slice, create blisters. You'll look like you're wearing golf cleats in public.
customer_reviews.text: Frustrating to buy shoes in the mid-range, I wanted some minimal trail runners. Thought these would provide a snug, right-on-the-foot fit for running trails in dusty Los Angeles parks. These fit poorly, some stitching or seamwork or whatever the hell it is dig into my feet at odd places, there's a ton of discomfort on either end of the toebox, and this all came crashing down a few hours into wearing, which of course is after you can return them. It's a shoddy shoe, and I wish I never bought them because I can't wear them comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M.

customer_reviews.title: Liking it so far.
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get this pair. Hey, it's quarantine and gotta have something even a pair of shoes. The shoes fitted well and comfortable. Took it for a break in trail run that afternoon. Light, easily handling dirt, rocky trails and feet held firmly inside. I also loved the design of the shoe. Many of the trail shoes are a bit to color heavy for me.
customer_reviews.author: archboy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Trails
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to hike in Hawaii in since there would be more mixed terrain and these shoes are amazing. You don’t slip on anything. Typically when hiking I have an issue when going downhill of my toes jamming into the front of the shoe but unnoticed that with these it doesn’t happen. These are great for hiking mud, rock, sand, anything!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Tuley

customer_reviews.title: Not a great color
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are kind of stiff, and there is a reason more companies don't make light blue hiking shoes. They draw attention to themselves and show dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Pann

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATER RESISTANT
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Terrex model before this and it was waterproof. I ordered this new model with same expetation and was sad to learn on the first use that they are in fact NOT water resistant as my feet got wet in the first low puddle I stepped in.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes!
customer_reviews.text: It is slightly bigger than my usual size 11 adidas. But it’s still nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: Very light shoe
customer_reviews.text: A little on the large size of 11 1/2 but very light. I have very narrow feet and these fit perfect to my width. Another great set of adidas.
customer_reviews.author: Fogleman33

customer_reviews.title: Not Gortex
customer_reviews.text: I was sent women's size and these are definitely not gortex.
customer_reviews.author: msparkman

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: We bought these shoes for our son to use while day hiking. The fit is consistent to his size and they are comfortable for him to wear - a requirement for him.
customer_reviews.author: luvbnamomi

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Color
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I love the look and the fit. They provide nice support for the overpronation that I experience. I would purchase these again in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: K. M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I love adidas shoes and own about 5 different pair but these are not comfortable at all. Flip flops have more cushioning. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Skynet Global Defense System

customer_reviews.title: Love em
customer_reviews.text: After porch pirates took my first pair I reupped buying these when an Angel (who i wish best o luck in vegas) took pity on me they look cool and are nice and light
customer_reviews.author: anton sprajc

customer_reviews.title: 2 sizes too big
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always liked Adidas, but I’m positive that they sell off sized shoes online. This is the third pair that I’ve bought and they are at least 2 sizes too big! It’s really a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for outdoors hiking, walking, fishing etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Way too small
customer_reviews.text: The size was way off and the show is super thin and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: ADIDAS amazing shoe
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe great fit, great looking and love the quick lace!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On my feet for 10 hours a day! These shoes help
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! I use them for work , very comfortable! I do wish they were a tad bit wider but I do have wider feet so I can’t blame the shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for hiking
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! First day worn took them on a hike! Didn’t even need to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Ayala

customer_reviews.title: I like the way this shoes look
customer_reviews.text: I used this shoes for work and I like the way it fits and feels
customer_reviews.author: FATII RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Good looking “casual” sneaker but....
customer_reviews.text: Good looking “casual” sneaker, but not much support. Upper part seemed too cheaply made. Looking for more of a performance shoe. Upgraded to the Terrex Agravic GTX. Awaiting delivery
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Shoes tore through in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I have worn for 3 weeks and my pinky toes have already ripped through the side of the shoes. Can I return these still?
customer_reviews.author: Martin G. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Don’t want to pay return shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Unable to return or exchange easily. If I’d have known this an ‘outside hub’ item would not have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Mw

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Started to tear at about 2 months, it’s bern3 months now and they are unwearable
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: Best!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and very light! Was suppose to use it for golf... I now my go to shoe 😍
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie R.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing in real life and is very light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Aqdas Khan

product_meta.title: adidas mens IG341 Terrex Two
product_meta.description: Think big. Go bigger. Enjoy every step of the journey. These adidas Terrex Two Trail Running Shoes offer the fit and flex to support your feet on extended runs. They let you move with confidence over rough trails and rocky, rooted terrain.
feature_bullets: Stay comfortable and steady on those trails and mountain paths with the adidas® Outdoor Terrex Two hiking trail shoe.
Traditional lace-up style with sturdy fabric laces and webbing loops for a secure fit.
Back pull loop for assisted entry.

Breathable textile lining for all-day interior comfort. Lightly cushioned textile footbed for underfoot comfort and support. Lightweight EVA midsole for improved underfoot comfort and shock absorption. Continental™ Rubber outsole for extraordinary grip even in wet conditions. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 10 oz Product measurements were taken using size 8, width B - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a
